Test Name: Urine Macroscopic with Reflex Microscopic (UA REFLEX MICROSCOPIC)
Purpose: To perform a urine macroscopic analysis and, when indicated, a reflex microscopic examination to ensure accurate and consistent urinalysis results in compliance with regulatory guidelines.
Container: Urinalysis centrifuge tube (or equivalent sterile urine container)
Equipment: Siemens Multistix 10SG reagent strips, microscope, dipstick reader, timer, centrifuge
